Uses of Interface
com.riskgame.strategy.PlayerStrategy

  • Packages that use PlayerStrategy 
    Package Description
    com.riskgame.strategy  

    • Uses of PlayerStrategy in com.riskgame.strategy

      Classes in com.riskgame.strategy that implement PlayerStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggressive
      Aggressive player reinforces the strongest country, attacks until the army count of the attacking country is one, fortifies the strongest country.
      class  Benevolent
      Benevolent player reinforces its weakest countries, does not attack, fortifies by moving armies to weaker countries
      class  Cheater
      Cheater player whose reinforcement method doubles the army count on all its countries, attack method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
      class  Human
      Implementation of this class is based on the normal human player
      class  RandomPlayer
      Random player reinforces random country, attacks random country a random number of times and fortifies a random country(implementation similar to human player but happens in a random fashion)
